official-title.#text:
To amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act
		  to improve oversight of nursing facilities under the Medicare and Medicaid
		  programs by preventing inappropriate influence over surveyors, and for other
		  purposes.

text.#text: by striking

Each
				State

by adding at the
			 end the following new clause:

The supervisor of the
				survey team shall review each survey conducted under this subsection to ensure
				that any issues that impact quality of care that are identified by such surveys
				are consistently and appropriately described and rated by the survey
				team.
